name: css
toBase64
onlyAllowJson

format:
<form action="/upload" method="POST" enctype="multipart/form-data">
    
    <label>Unique Device Name</label>
    </br>
    <input type="text" name="myName"/>
    
    </br></br>
    
    <label>Common Name</label>
    </br>
    <input type="text" name="myCommonName"/>
    
    </br></br>
    
    <label>Location Key (SSID)</label>
    </br>
    <input type="text" name="myLocationKey"/>
    
    </br></br>
    
    <label>Location path (building/floor/room)</label>
    </br>
    <input type="text" name="myLocationPath"/>
    
    </br></br>
    
    <label>Scale</label>
    </br>
    <input type="text" name="myScale"/>
    
    </br></br>
    
    
    <label>Modelfile (obj, fbx, blend, 3DS)</label>
    </br>
    <input class="md-file" type="file" name="myFile" />
    
    </br></br>
    
    <input class="md-button" type="submit" value="Submit">
</form>

name: Id present
setup params
create table device
rockpro64 insert sample data device
template:
INSERT INTO rrdevices.device(id, name, description, date_prod)
VALUES ('ROCKPRO64', 'Rock Pro 64', 'RK3399 SoC based Arm computer', now());

name: select part, device, instance
template:
SELECT a.id AS instancename, b.id AS devicename, c.id AS partname 
FROM 
rrdevices.deviceinstance a,
rrdevices.device b,
rrdevices.parts c
WHERE
a.deviceid = b.id AND
a.deviceid = c.deviceid
;

name: insert or update device
update devices of location
create table parts
template:
CREATE TABLE rrdevices.parts (
    id           char(20),
    deviceid     char(20) NOT NULL,
    name         varchar(50) NOT NULL,
    description  varchar(250),
    date_prod   date
);

func: return msg;
return msg;

name: rockpro64 insert sample data
template:
INSERT INTO rrdevices.parts(id, deviceid, name, description, date_prod)
VALUES 
('MAIN-PCBA', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Main PCB', 'Board holding all components. Sandwich design.', NOW()),
('HDMI_2', 'ROCKPRO64', 'HDMI Connector', 'Full size HDMI connector.', NOW()),
('DC-BIG', 'ROCKPRO64', '12V DC-IN', '12V Barrelconenctor.', NOW()),
('RJ45', 'ROCKPRO64', '12V DC-IN', '12V Barrelconenctor.', NOW()),
('PRT0003', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Common part', 'A common part.', NOW()),
('USB', 'ROCKPRO64', 'USB Connector', 'The USB connector.', NOW()),
('TYPC', 'ROCKPRO64', 'TYPE-C Connector', 'The USB-C connector.', NOW()),
('JACK', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Headphone Jack', '3.5mm Headphone Jack', NOW()),
('MICRO-SD-HOUSING__1', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Micro SD-Card housing', 'Metal housing for standard micro SD-Card.', NOW()),
('MICRO-SD-CARD__1', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Mirco SD-Card', 'Mirco SD-Card', NOW()),
('MINI_SD_ASM_1_ASM', 'ROCKPRO64', 'Mini SD-Card connector', 'Mini SD-Card connector', NOW()),
('IR', 'ROCKPRO64', 'IR Receiver', 'IR Receiver', NOW()),
('TYPC001', 'ROCKPRO64', 'TYPE-C Connector 2', 'Secondary USB-C Connector', NOW()),
('MAIN-PCB_ASM', 'ROCKPRO64', 'PCB Assembly', 'Main PCB for assembly', NOW())
;

name: create table deviceinstance
template:
CREATE TABLE rrdevices.deviceinstance (
    id           CHAR(20) CONSTRAINT firstkey PRIMARY KEY,
    deviceid     CHAR(20) NOT NULL,
	 name         varchar(40) NOT NULL,
    description  varchar(40),
    date_prod   date
);

(id, name, score, gender, country, type, disambiguation) \
VALUES \
(" +
"'" + msg.payload.id + "'," + 
"'" + msg.payload.name + "'," +  
msg.payload.score + "," +  
"'" + msg.payload.gender + "'," +  
"'" + msg.payload.country + "'," +  
"'" + msg.payload.type + "'," +
"'" + msg.payload.disambiguation + "'" +
");"
;

msg.payload = query;

return msg;

name: C
J
I
H
E
SB
O
L
parse query from parameters
func:
var coverid = msg.payload.coverid;

var query = 
"SELECT \
b.name AS artist, \
a.name AS song, \
a.coverid AS coverid, \
a.coverart AS coverart, \
a.published AS publishdate, \
a.publisher AS publisher, \
b.score AS score, \
a.soldcopies AS soldcopies, \
a.genre AS genre \
FROM \
mopop.works a, \
mopop.artists b \
WHERE a.coverid = '" + coverid + "'" + " " +
  "AND a.artistid = b.id"
;

msg.payload = query;
return msg;

msg.payload = msg.payload[0];
return msg;

msg.payload = new Date(msg.payload.publishdate).getFullYear();
return msg;

msg.payload = '{"Time":"2021-09-13T23:36:11","BME280":{"Temperature":24.8,"Humidity":52.3,"Pressure":977.7},"PressureUnit":"hPa","TempUnit":"C"}';
return msg;

func:
var visData = 
{
    "UID":"",
    "VisualisationType":"SCATTERPLOT",
    "parallelCoordinatesDimensionsAttributes":[],
    "parallelCoordinatesDimensionsMinFilter":[],
    "parallelCoordinatesDimensionsMaxFilter":[],

    "AxiesKeys":[0,1],
    "AxiesValues":["id","temperature"],
    "ColourDimension":"temperature",
    "SizeDimension":"Undefined",
    "LinkingDimension":"names",
    "colourKeys":

name: apply json
setup years
store id
apply data
to object
client filter
testing list data
update score label
parse query from parameters
func:
var coverid = msg.payload.coverid;

var query = 
"SELECT \
CONCAT(a.name, ' (', a.genre, ')') as title, \
b.name AS description, \
b.name AS artist, \
a.name AS song, \
a.coverid AS coverid, \
a.coverart AS coverart, \
a.published AS publishdate, \
a.publisher AS publisher, \
b.score AS score, \
a.soldcopies AS soldcopies, \
a.genre AS genre \
FROM \
mopop.works a, \
mopop.artists b \
WHERE 1=1 \
  AND a.artistid = b.id \
ORDER BY a.name ASC \
"
;
//CONCAT(a.name, ', ', b.name) as title \
// "AND a.coverid = '" + coverid + "'" + " "
msg.payload = query;
return msg;

//msg.payload = msg.payload[0];
return msg;

msg.payload = new Date(msg.payload.publishdate).getFullYear();
return msg;
